content:
That sounds good. Here are all five:

1. Advanced Zero Trust Administration for Azure, Exchange Online, and Application Onboarding
2. Identity Fabric-based Converged Platform with Modular Licensing for IGA, Access Management, and PAM
3. Low Code Identity Orchestrations Automate your Unique Business Processes
4. Authorization Management with Powerful RBAC and PBAC Hybrid Engine
5. Cross-System Risk Management for SAP, Azure, and Other Environments
